learning.unsupervised.outliers

Class OutlierDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.unsupervised.outliers.OutlierDetector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AntiHub, FastABOD, IterativeClusteringOutlierDetection, LDOF, LocalOutlierFactor, LOCI

    public abstract class OutlierDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that defines the methods for outlier detection and implements some common functions.

    • Method Detail

      • numberOfOutliersFound

        public int numberOfOutliersFound()
        Returns:
        The number of outliers that have been detected.

      • getOutlierScoresMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Float> getOutlierScoresMap()
        Returns:
        HashMap that maps the outlier indexes to their calculated outlier scores. If the point is not an outlier, its index is not in the map.

      • isOutlier

        public boolean isOutlier(int index)
        Checks if an index points to an outlier instance.
        Parameters:
        index - Index within a DataSet.
        Returns:
        True if the instance is an outlier, false otherwise.

      • setOutlierIndexes

        protected void setOutlierIndexes(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> outlierIndexes,
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> outlierScores)
        Sets the outlier indexes and outlier scores. Meant to be used from within the classes that extend OutlierDetector.
        Parameters:
        outlierIndexes - The indexes of detected outliers.
        outlierScores - The calculated outlier scores.

      • setOutlierIndexes

        protected void setOutlierIndexes(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> outlierIndexes)
        Sets the outlier indexes. Meant to be used from within the classes that extend OutlierDetector.
        Parameters:
        outlierIndexes -

      • getOutlierIndexes

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getOutlierIndexes()
        Returns:
        The indexes of the detected outliers within the DataSet.

        public void setDataSet(DataSet dataset)
        Sets the dataset to be analyzed.
        Parameters:
        dataset - DataSet object.

      • getDataSet

        public DataSet getDataSet()
        Returns:
        DataSet that is currently being analyzed.

      • getOutliers

        public java.util.ArrayList<DataInstance> getOutliers()
        Gets the actual outliers instead of just the indexes.
        Returns:
        A list of outlier objects.
